messages.body:
abubakarsadiq6@gmail.com


11/17/2011 6:52:35 A.M. Eastern Standard Time:


Attn:Contractor / Beneficiary.


 We, the entire members of the Federal House of Senate, on behalf of the Federal Republic of Nigerian Government, Under the auspices of the President GOODLUCK JONATHAN and the Governor of Central Bank Of Nigeria , SANUSI LAMIDO SANUSI held a meeting last week concerning payment , both foreign and local contractors and some inheritance funds.


  On going through files RECENTLY, we discovered that your file was dumped untreated, so at this juncture, we apologize for the delay of your payment and please stop communicating with any office now and concentrate your attention to the appointed office below for you to receive your payment accordingly.


  Now your new Payment Reference No.-35460021, Allocation No: 674632, Having received these vital payment number , therefore You are qualified now to received and confirm Your payment with the Federal Government of Nigeria immediately within the stipulated time and schedule.


  Now you are directed to contact the Office of the DEBT MANAGEMENT OFFICE "DMO"--- For the immediate release of your fund you should reconfirm your banking Details , this is to avoid mistake while transferring your overdue payment to you as we proceed into the final stage of your fund release.


  CONTACT PHONE OFFICE LINE: +234-1-821-2840


 Contact him now and inform him that you received an email from The Federal House of Senate Federal Republic of Nigeria, Instructing you to write him for immediate release of your fund and forward your Details to his office to avoid transfer mistake.


  NOTE: We have mounted our security network to mo nitor every in-coming call, if we still find o ut that you are still dealing with any order officer apart from the new appointed officer who is in charge of payment. We will stop and cancel your payment you should help and not frustrating our effort.


  Best Regards


 JOHN MAKI


 

 DIRECTOR FUND VETTING COMMITTEE DEBT MANAGEMENT OFFICE(DMO)nigeria

On going through files RECENTLY, we discovered that your file was dumped untreated, so at this juncture, we apologize for the delay of your payment and please stop communicating with any office now and concentrate your attention to the appointed office below for you to receive your payment accordingly.

Now your new Payment Reference No.-35460021, Allocation No: 674632, Having received these vital payment number , therefore You are qualified now to received and confirm Your payment with the Federal Government of Nigeria immediately within the stipulated time and schedule.

Now you are directed to contact the Office of the DEBT MANAGEMENT OFFICE "DMO"--- For the immediate release of your fund you should reconfirm your banking Details , this is to avoid mistake while transferring your overdue payment to you as we proceed into the final stage of your fund release.

messages.body:
Thu, Nov 17, 2011 at 5:51 AM


I'm certainly glad to see that the entire members are writing me.  It would be to disturbing to think of partial members trying to communicate.


I am curious as to the nature of the file you mention, and the payment you claim I am due.  I have never hand any business dealings with anyone in Nigeria, nor do I know anyone there.


Please send a copy of the file.


Thank you,
Nathan Detroit.

messages.body:
On Fri, Nov 18, 2011 at 5:04 AM


You have informed me that I am due a large sum of money, and have not been very forthcoming as to the source.  I think it only prudent to want to examine the documents.  I don't mind a little difficulty when so large a sum is involved.   Please send the documents as instructed.  I believe I mentioned that I am not inclined to do business on the telephone.


Thank you,

 
Detroit.

messages.body:
11/21/2011 7:44:28 A.M.:


ATTN:NATHAN DETROIT,


THANKS FOR RESPONDING TO MY VARIOUS EMAILS AND YOUR INQUIRIES CONCERNING THE TRANSACTION.
NOW LET ME BREAK THIS TO YOU.WE HAVE FLOATING SUM OF MONEY AS A RESULT OF INVOICE FROM A CONTRACT AWARDED AND HAS BEEN SINCE EXECUTED AND THE CONTRACTOR HAS BEEN PAID,BUT WE HAVE INFLATED THE CONTRACT SUM FOR OUR OWN BENEFIT AND WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF YOU WOULD BE ABLE TO HANDLE SUCH AMOUNT OF MONEY ( $11.2 MILLION USD).


I WAS HOPING TO DISCUSS THIS WITH YOU ON PHONE AND THAT HAS BEEN MY REASON FOR ASKING FOR YOU TELEPHONE NUMBER AND NOW I DECIDED TO INFORM YOU BY EMAIL AND HOPING THAT YOU WILL BE ABLE TO RECEIVE  SUCH AMOUNT OF MONEY IN ANY ACCOUNT YOU MAY WISH TO PROVIDE,BUT THIS WILL BE AFTER WE HAD DISCUSSED AND  REACHED AN AGREEMENT THAT WILL BE OF BENEFIT TO ALL OF US.


TO PROCEED WITH THIS PROJECT I WILL LIKE YOU SEND YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER SO WE CAN AS MEN IN POTENTIAL TRANSACTION.


AT THE END OF OUR TELEPHONE DISCUSSION I WILL ADVICE YOU TO FORWARD A COMPANY NAME WITH WHICH WE WILL REGISTER WITH THE CORPORATE AFFAIRS COMMISSION (CAC) AS THE OWNER BENEVOLENT OWNER OF THIS FUND AND THIS WILL MAKE IT LEGAL AND YOU WILL BE ENTITLED TO SOME DOCUMENT WHICH I WILL SEND TO YOU FOR YOUR PERUSAL AND APPEND YOUR SIGNATURE ALL THIS ARE REQUIRED TO MAKE FUND FREE AND WITH OUT PROBLEM.


IN CONCLUSION I AM HERE TO MAKE IT SUCCEED,I DID THIS WITH AN AMERICAN LAST YEAR THE MAN JUST VANISHED INTO THE THIN AIR WITH THE FUND ABOUT 7.5 MILLION USD AND YOU KNOW THERE IS NOTHING I COULD BECAUSE I AM CIVIL SERVANT AND WE ARE NOT ALLOWED TO RUN A FOREIGN ACCOUNT AND THIS IS MY REASON FOR CONTACTING YOU AND INFORMING YOU OF YOUR FUND AL TOUGH NOT COMING DIRECTLY BUT BEEN CAUTIOUS OF MY WORDS AND CORRESPONDENCE.THIS TRANSACTION IF WE WORK TOGETHER WILL BE THROUGH BY NEXT WEEK AND I WILL MEET YOU ON HOW WE HAD AGREED ON THE PERCENTAGE SHARING.


I AWAIT YOUR RESPONSE.
JOHN MAKI

messages.body:
On Mon, Nov 21, 2011 at 6:14 AM


So, essentially, you're asking me whether I'll help you claim funds to which you have no legitimate claim, you opened your correspondence with me about this matter with a lie, and now you want me to trust you.


Can you see the logical inconsistency?

 
Detroit.

messages.body:
11/22/2011 11:46:07 A.M.:


DEAR:NATHAN,


I DO UNDERSTAND YOUR APPREHENSION,BUT TO BE CANDID WITH YOU THERE IS NO RISK INVOLVED.
NO I HAVE NOT DONE ANY WORK,BUT THIS CONTRACT WAS AWARDED TO FOREIGN CONTRACTORS AS YOU MAY KNOW FOREIGNERS DO COME TO NIGERIA FOR THE PURSUANCE OF CONTRACT JOBS IN DIFFERENT CATEGORIES,IN OIL SECTORS,CONSTRUCTION, ENERGY AND E.TC.  AND AT THE TIME OF AWARDING THIS CONTRACT WE ALREADY KNEW THERE WAS GOING TO BE OVER INVOICE AT THE END OF THE CONTRACT EXECUTION AND THE OUT COME OF THIS IS THE AMOUNT OF FUND I MENTIONED EARLIER TO YOU.


YES I AM ONE OF THE SIGNATORIES IN MY OFFICE AS THE DIRECTOR OF VETTING CONTRACT PAYMENT IN THIS CATEGORY.ANY FILE I PUSH OUT FOR PAYMENT WILL BE CERTAINLY ATTENDED TO,HENCE I PUSHED OUT AND VETTED THIS FILE FOR PAYMENT. MOST TIMES AS CONTRACTS ARE AWARDED THERE ARE TENDENCIES FOR OVER INVOICE,ALTHOUGH IT MIGHT NOT BE IN YOUR OWN CATEGORY,SOME OTHER OFFICER IS SOME WHERE MAKING MONEY OUT OF IT AND THIS IS WHY MOST NIGERIA CIVIL SERVANT IN NIGERIA ARE VERY RICH.IMAGINE BY THE TIME I PULL THIS THROUGH WHAT DO YOU THINK WILL HAPPEN TO OUR BANK ACCOUNTS.


REMEMBER,I HAVE ABUBAKAR SADIQ MY FRIEND HE IS MY ASSOCIATE.ABUBAKAR IS AMONG THE CONTRACT SIGNATORIES.HE IS AWARE OF THE WHOLE TRANSACTION,BUT BECAUSE I AM IN THE POSITION FOR THE FILE PAYMENT.HE IS SILENT.BECAUSE I HAVE TO ORGANISE THINGS RIGTH IN MY OWN WAY.


THIS CONTRACT SUM COMES IN FROM DIFFERENT CONTRACTORS AND THIS ONE IS FOR US AS IT EMANATE FROM DIFFERENT CONTRACTS AWARDED IN MANY YEARS.


DO NOT FORGET THAT OTHER OFFICIALS ARE DOING SAME IN THEIR OWN CATEGORY IN OTHER OFFICES ACROSS THE COUNTRY TO BE PRECISE IN OTHER MINISTRIES.CONTRACT ARE AWARDED TO CONTRACTORS FROM DIFFERENT GOVERNMENT ESTABLISHMENT.THE DEBT MANAGEMENT OFFICE IS FOR THE PAYMENT OF LONG TIME CONTRACT AWARDED,BUT THE CONTRACTORS FUND IS OVER DUE FOR PAYMENT AND WE SERVE AS CONCILIATORY OR DO YOU CALL IT  THE ARBITER BETWEEN THE CONTRACTORS.


NOBODY IS GOING TO PROSECUTE YOU MY BROTHER.IF YOU ARE GOING TO BE PROSECUTED THEN WHAT WILL HAPPEN TO ME ? NO BODY WILL PROSECUTE YOU BECAUSE ALL DOCUMENT WILL BE PROVIDED AND SENT TO YOU FOR YOUR PERUSAL..THIS BUSINESS HAS NEVER GONE SORE AND WILL NEVER GO SORE ANY TIME IN MY COUNTRY NIGERIA.
I WILL LIKE US TO SPEAK ON PHONE FOR MORE ASSURANCE.
 THIS IS NOT A FRAUD MY BROTHER THE FUND HAS BEEN MAPPED OUT FOR PAYMENT AND FOR YOUR SAKE AND MY SAKE I NEED SOME DOCUMENTS TO MAKE IT LEGITIMATE  BECAUSE YOU ARE A FOREIGNER AND A CONTRACTOR.AS I AM GOING TO REGISTER YOUR COMPANY NAME WITH THE COOPERATE AFFAIRS COMMISSION AS A CONTRACTOR AND TRANSFER THE FUND INTO THE ACCOUNT YOU WILL PROVIDE.


I AM VERY GLAD YOU ARE CAREFUL AND I WILL LIKE YOU TO TELL ME THE KIND OF BUSINESS I WILL INVEST  IN YOUR COUNTRY AS SOON AS WE ARE THROUGH.


BE REST ASSURED BROTHER THAT THERE IS NO PROBLEM AND NO BODY IS CHARGING US FOR FRAUD.


I WAIT YOUR RESPONSE.
JOHN MAKI

DO NOT FORGET THAT OTHER OFFICIALS ARE DOING SAME IN THEIR OWN CATEGORY IN OTHER OFFICES ACROSS THE COUNTRY TO BE PRECISE IN OTHER MINISTRIES.CONTRACT ARE AWARDED TO CONTRACTORS FROM DIFFERENT GOVERNMENT ESTABLISHMENT.THE DEBT MANAGEMENT OFFICE IS FOR THE PAYMENT OF LONG TIME CONTRACT AWARDED,BUT THE CONTRACTORS FUND IS OVER DUE FOR PAYMENT AND WE SERVE AS CONCILIATORY OR DO YOU CALL IT THE ARBITER BETWEEN THE CONTRACTORS.

NOBODY IS GOING TO PROSECUTE YOU MY BROTHER.IF YOU ARE GOING TO BE PROSECUTED THEN WHAT WILL HAPPEN TO ME ? NO BODY WILL PROSECUTE YOU BECAUSE ALL DOCUMENT WILL BE PROVIDED AND SENT TO YOU FOR YOUR PERUSAL..THIS BUSINESS HAS NEVER GONE SORE AND WILL NEVER GO SORE ANY TIME IN MY COUNTRY NIGERIA.
I WILL LIKE US TO SPEAK ON PHONE FOR MORE ASSURANCE.
THIS IS NOT A FRAUD MY BROTHER THE FUND HAS BEEN MAPPED OUT FOR PAYMENT AND FOR YOUR SAKE AND MY SAKE I NEED SOME DOCUMENTS TO MAKE IT LEGITIMATE BECAUSE YOU ARE A FOREIGNER AND A CONTRACTOR.AS I AM GOING TO REGISTER YOUR COMPANY NAME WITH THE COOPERATE AFFAIRS COMMISSION AS A CONTRACTOR AND TRANSFER THE FUND INTO THE ACCOUNT YOU WILL PROVIDE.

I AM VERY GLAD YOU ARE CAREFUL AND I WILL LIKE YOU TO TELL ME THE KIND OF BUSINESS I WILL INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY AS SOON AS WE ARE THROUGH.

BE REST ASSURED BROTHER THAT THERE IS NO PROBLEM AND NO BODY IS CHARGING US FOR FRAUD.

I WAIT YOUR RESPONSE.
JOHN MAKI

messages.body:
On Tue, Nov 22, 2011 at 12:01 PM

 
Of course I'm careful.  My years in a criminal justice agency have made me so.  I tend to investigate this sort of thing very thoroughly.  I have some people looking into it even now.
